com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation

Class MapboxOfflineRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.MapboxOfflineRouter

  • public class MapboxOfflineRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for offline routing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapboxOfflineRouter(java.lang.String offlinePath)
      Creates an offline router which uses the specified offline path for storing and retrieving data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(java.lang.String version, OnOfflineTilesConfiguredCallback callback)
      Configures the navigator for getting offline routes.
      void downloadTiles(OfflineTiles offlineTiles, RouteTileDownloadListener listener)
      Starts the download of tiles specified by the provided OfflineTiles object.
      void fetchAvailableTileVersions(java.lang.String accessToken, OnTileVersionsFoundCallback callback)
      Call this method to fetch the latest available offline tile versions that can be used with downloadTiles(OfflineTiles, RouteTileDownloadListener).
      void findRoute(OfflineRoute route, OnOfflineRouteFoundCallback callback)
      Uses libvalhalla and local tile data to generate mapbox-directions-api-like JSON.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapboxOfflineRouter

        public MapboxOfflineRouter(java.lang.String offlinePath)
        Creates an offline router which uses the specified offline path for storing and retrieving data.
        Parameters:
        offlinePath - directory path where the offline data is located

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(java.lang.String version,
                      OnOfflineTilesConfiguredCallback callback)
        Configures the navigator for getting offline routes.
        Parameters:
        version - version of offline tiles to use
        callback - a callback that will be fired when the offline data is configured and findRoute(OfflineRoute, OnOfflineRouteFoundCallback) can be called safely

      • findRoute

        public void findRoute(@NonNull
                      OfflineRoute route,
                      OnOfflineRouteFoundCallback callback)
        Uses libvalhalla and local tile data to generate mapbox-directions-api-like JSON.
        Parameters:
        route - the OfflineRoute to get a DirectionsRoute from
        callback - a callback to pass back the result

      • downloadTiles

        public void downloadTiles(OfflineTiles offlineTiles,
                          RouteTileDownloadListener listener)
        Starts the download of tiles specified by the provided OfflineTiles object.
        Parameters:
        offlineTiles - object specifying parameters for the tile request
        listener - which is updated on error, on progress update and on completion

      • fetchAvailableTileVersions

        public void fetchAvailableTileVersions(java.lang.String accessToken,
                                       OnTileVersionsFoundCallback callback)
        Call this method to fetch the latest available offline tile versions that can be used with downloadTiles(OfflineTiles, RouteTileDownloadListener).
        Parameters:
        accessToken - Mapbox access token to call the version API
        callback - with the available versions
